short_summary: Peer Support Training for the Employee Assistance Program
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to establish a contract to satisfy its requirement for contractor services in the area of Employee Assistance Program (EAP) Peer Support Training.
full_summary:
====================================


**Peer Support Training for the Employee Assistance Program**

#### Solicitation Details


**Solicitation Number**: W6369-24-X015
**Tender Closing Date**: January 11, 2024, 14:00:00
**Publication Date**: November 9, 2023

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide Peer Support Training for the Employee Assistance Program (EAP) under a one (1) year contract with four (4) irrevocable options to extend the term.

### Description of Work


The EAP Peer Support Training program aims to equip employees with skills and knowledge to support their colleagues in need. The selected contractor will be responsible for delivering the training program, as detailed in Annex “A” of the Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Evaluation Criteria


The evaluation of bids will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (60%) and price (40%). The Mandatory and Point Rated Criteria are detailed in the RFP.

### Requirements and Supporting Documents


Bidders must provide the required information as outlined in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the RFP to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

Please find the documents required for this solicitation at the following links:

*   [RFP Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24450/w6369-24-x015-rfp.pdf)
*   [RFP Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24450/fr_w6369-24-x015-rfp.pdf)
*   [QA Document 1 (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24450/w6369-24-x015-qa-1.pdf)
*   [QA Document 1 (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24450/fr_w6369-24-x015-qa-1.pdf)




### Additional Information


The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

The Department of National Defence reserves the right to not award a contract, regardless of the proposals received.

Should there be any discrepancies between this notice and the RFP, the latter shall prevail.
